questions.question: How many years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen is the show set

Which 2 actresses play Princess Rhaenyra
What relation is Daemon to Rhaenarys

Which dragon does Aemond eventually claim as him own
What is Larys Strong's nickname
In which part of King's Landing are children made to fight against each other in an arena
Which dragon does Vhagar kill in the season finale
Who is made King after King Viserys' death
Mysaria, who leads a network of spies in King's Landing, also goes by what name
Which actor played the Maester of Dragonstone
Ser Laenor Valeryon fakes his death and escapes Driftmark with which other knight
What is the seat of House Baratheon called
How are King Viserys I and Princess Rhaenys Targaryen related
What is Prince Daemon's dragon called
What drink is used to ease King Viserys' pain
Who does Daemon decapitate in the throne room
What animal do King Viserys and his men hunt for in the woods
Famously spoken by Daenerys Targaryen on the show "Game of Thrones", what command does Rhaenyra Targaryen give to her dragon to light the funeral pyres of her dead mother and brother
What does the command Dracarys mean
answers: is the nifty command the Targaryens use when they want their dragons to breathe fire

questions.question: What was the name of the Targaryen king who reigned for sixty years and brought together lords from lands throughout the realm to announce who would become his heir
What is the name of Rhaenyra Targaryens Dragon
Princess Rhaenyra Targaryen tells her mother that she'd like to serve as a knight and ride to battle and glory. What does her mother tell her is their battlefield
Rhaenyra's mother, Aemma, dies how
What name is given to the alliance between the Free Cities of Lys, Myr and Tyros that have undertaken to occupy the Narrow Sea that separates the continents of Westeros and Essos
Named after their attire, what name is given to the new City Watch of King's Landing that is led by the king's brother, Prince Daemon Targaryen
King Viserys Targaryen hosts an event known as the 'Heirs Tournament' in recognition of the upcoming birth of his second child. What is the primary activity of this tournament
Tragically, the king's wife, Aemma, dies during the birth of their second child who also dies shortly after. What term does Prince Daemon Targaryen use to describe his nephew that angers King Viserys
ng Viserys Targaryen names his daughter, Princess Rhaenyra Targaryen his successor. In doing so, she also becomes the princess of which island whose castle is occupied by the heir to the Iron Throne
Daemon Targaryen attacks the army of Prince Drahar, 'The Crabfeeder', with his dragon Caraxes. Where does Drahar's army retreat to
For what event does King Viserys hold a grand celebration with visitors from many prominent families
answers: The second Name day of his second child, his son Aegon

questions.question: King Viserys's new Master of Ships, Tyland Lannister, implores the king to take what action that he had resisted doing for over three years
answers: Send troops and ships to Bloodstone to aid Daemon and Corlys

questions.question: King Viserys Targaryen tries to betroth his daughter Rhaenyra to Jason Lannister. What does Jason tell Rhaenyra he can build for her at his castle on Casterly Rock

After Rhaenyra Targaryen rides away from the celebration arranged by her father, her and Ser Criston Cole end up getting ambushed. What type of animal that would later kill Robert Baratheon attacks Rhaenyra and Criston
What does Daemon Targaryen do that leads the Triarchy army of Prince Drahar out of their cover
Who helps save Daemon Targaryen by riding the dragon Seasmoke and taking out the archers of the Triarchy

The second episode of "House of the Dragon" begins with the iconic main title theme music first used in the show "Game of Thrones". What Iranian-German individual composed the main title theme music for "House of the Dragon"
What nickname is given to the Prince-Admiral Craghas Drahar of the Triarchy due to the ruthless way he treats his enemies
King Viserys Targaryen tasks Princess Rhaenyra with selecting the next member of the Kingsguard. Why does she select Ser Criston Cole
answers: hes the only one with combat experience

questions.question: King Viserys is recommended to marry Lady Laena by multiple members of his council. Who is Lady Laena's father, an extremely wealthy man known as the 'Sea Snake'

At various points it is explained that King Viserys Targaryen was the last rider of a dragon known as 'Black Dread'. Who was this dragon that was rode by Aegon the Conqueror during the War of Conquest
In his spare time King Viserys creates a stone model of Old Valyria. After one of the dragons in his model breaks, who makes him a replacement
What is stolen by Prince Daemon Targaryen and brought back to a castle that he is illegally occupying
In addition to stealing something valuable from the king, Prince Daemon Targaryen also announces that he will marry Mysaria. Why is this action considered unacceptable
As Daemon and Otto's soldiers are about to engage each other on a bridge, who rides in on a dragon, talks Daemon down and retrieves what was stolen
Upset over King Viserys's decisions, Lord Corlys Velaryon and Prince Daemon Targaryen discuss options. What common bond do Corlys and Daemon share that means their worth is not given and must be made
